description: This source file defines the LongIPC class, which implements the ObjectIPC interface. It provides methods to serialize and deserialize a Long value to and from JSON format, along with constructors and accessors.

classes.name: LongIPC
classes.description: A class representing an IPC object that encapsulates a Long value, with JSON serialization/deserialization capabilities.

methods.name: LongIPC(long val)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the object with a specific Long value.

methods.name: toJSON()
methods.description: Serializes the object to a JSON object containing the Long value.

methods.name: fromJSON(JSONObject buffer)
methods.description: Deserializes the Long value from a JSON object.
